name: sap-tools-target
description: SAP tools for listing, searching orders and checking stock

inlinePayload.name: list_purchase_orders
inlinePayload.description: List purchase orders with optional filters (date, supplier, status). Use this when user asks for 'all orders', 'recent orders', 'orders from supplier X', etc.

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return (default 20, max 100)

date_from.description: Filter orders from this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

inlinePayload.name: search_purchase_orders
inlinePayload.description: Search purchase orders by PO number, supplier, or material. Use this when user wants to find specific orders matching criteria.

search_term.description: Term to search for (PO number, supplier code, material number)

search_field.description: Field to search in: po_number, supplier, material, or all

inlinePayload.name: get_material_stock
inlinePayload.description: Get current stock levels for materials. Use this when user asks about 'stock', 'inventory', 'available quantity', or 'low stock items'.

low_stock_only.description: Only return items with low stock (below threshold)

inlinePayload.name: get_orders_in_transit
inlinePayload.description: Get purchase orders that are in transit or being delivered. Use this when user asks about 'orders in shipping', 'orders being delivered', 'pending deliveries', etc.

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return (default 20)
